# test-suite-generator

> Generate comprehensive test suites for OSSA agents

## Quick Reference

- **Type**: OSSA Agent v0.4.1
- **Category**: testing
- **Manifest**: test-suite-generator.ossa.yaml

## Overview

Generate complete test suites including unit, integration, and E2E tests.
Supports multiple test frameworks (Jest, Mocha, Pytest).
Generates test fixtures and mocks.

capabilities:

## Related

- Main OSSA documentation: /README.md
- Agent manifest: ./test-suite-generator.ossa.yaml
- Agent details: ./AGENTS.md
